Pre-Game Insights: The LA Lakers and Minnesota Timberwolves tipoff their 2024 NBA preseason on Friday night in Palm Springs.
The Lakers enter this contest with a new coach in JJ Redick, who will take to the bench in this role for the first time in the NBA.
The Timberwolves have seen a major roster change just days before the preseason began as Karl-Anthony Towns got traded in a blockbuster deal to the Knicks for Julius Randle and Donte DiVincenzo.
The Lakers are predicted to rely heavily on the 3-point shot and play more through play calling and structure under coach JJ Redick.
LeBron James and Anthony Davis won't be available for the game on Friday.
Minnesota will not play Anthony Edwards and Julius Randle in the preseason opener.
